title: Walk-In Closets, Flexible Monthly Payments with Flex Rent, Cabana
posting_body: Nova North Apartments in Everett, WANova North Apartments offers a great location in Everett with close proximity to restaurants, shopping, and entertainment.
Nova North is perfectly located minutes from the beaches and fine dining of Mukilteo and a few minutes from Boeing, making for an easy commute.
Nova North residents enjoy swimming in the pool during the warm summer days and working out in the fitness center after a long day at work.
For the avid golfer, the Walter E Hall Golf Course is just a walk away.
People seeking a fun-filled afternoon can enjoy the playground or ball fields or head over to the Mukilteo Landing for waterfront activities.
Bring your skateboard and spend some time at the skate park, or enjoy a run or bike ride on the Interurban Trail.
Next to Golf Course and Parks
